name: Blink (itch) (Piper Thunstrom)
description:
Blink is a tiny experiment in meditative pixel art. Interact with the fireflies with your mouse: Any click will startle nearby fireflies, changing the pattern of their blinks. Use your secondary (often right) mouse button to spawn new fireflies. Enjoy the music by Ulrike.

Tools:

  • Built with ppb
  • Packaged with briefcase
  • Sound effects made with JFXR
  • Art done in aseprite

Other places to find Ulrike:

  • https://twitter.com/ulrikemusic
  • https://www.instagram.com/ulrikemusic/?hl=en
